channel.title: SoUL Ministries' podcast
channel.description:
We seek to promote understanding, harmony and love among people by emphasizing what is universal in the teachings of the many paths and faith traditions. We have chosen to learn about, respect and appreciate the diversity paths to Oneness, and to look for the universal truth contained in each one.
We are dedicated to serving the spiritual needs of all those who seek our guidance, counsel, and assistance, without regard to race, religion, socio economic status, sexual orientation, ethnic background, gender or age.
We are committed to personal, professional, spiritual, and ethical integrity and growth of all people, and in holding ourselves and each other accountable for "walking the talk" as ministers, guides, and teachers.
Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.
"People say that what they are seeking is a Meaning for Life. I believe that what we are seeking is an Experience for Being Alive"

item.title: The meaning and purpose of God's Word - Segment Two; a Life Giving Spirit
item.description:
The spirit is the part by which we commune with God and by which alone we are able to apprehend and worship Him. Because it tells of us our relationship to God, the spirit is called the element of God-Consciousness. God dwells in the spirit, self dwells in the..................

item.title: PURSUE LOVE - The Most Excellent Way - Episode 1015
item.description:
The Love of God in Christ to his saints, particularly, to the Corinthians'. And their use of Spiritual gifts in direct contrast to their intended purposes. Your Love, your Spiritual gifts to others, which is the most excellent way.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.

item.title: Why does God allow Trials in our Lives - Sermon Episode 1105
item.description:
Why does God allow trials in our Lives? (John 12:24-25)

Truly, truly, I say to you, Unless the grain of wheat that falls to the earth dies, it remains alone: But if it dies, it bears much fruit. There are two things you can do when trials, tests or tribulation comes your way.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.

item.title: Inspiration and Meditation Series - for the Rest of My Life
item.description:
for the Rest of My Life offers a plethora of data for the soul in it’s infinite journey. It’s soliloquy is a sublime meditative series of affirmations & thoughts , rooted in eternity. This tree has many branches & multi-colored leaves all flowing in the stream of light , energy & the power of love.

Whether one be a follower of the various faiths of this world or other worlds , the design of D.G.C.’s work is enthralling. Take a moment & let the power of this work draw you into a new reality.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.

My Odeo Channel (odeo/d30f503403c4cda8)

item.title: The meaning and purpose of God's Word - Segment One; a Living Soul
item.description:
God treated man's soul as something unique. As the angels were created as spirits, so man was created predomintly as a living soul. Man not only had a body, a body with the breath of life; he became a living soul as well. Thus we find later in the Scriptures that God often referred to men as "souls." Why?.............

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.

item.title: ADDICTION; in the belly of a Big Fish - Episode 108
item.description:
The scientists tell us for every action there is an equal and opposite reaction. In our relationship with God for every action there is also a consequence. See how Jonah's life parallels ours when we go contrary to God's will.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.

item.title: A New Christ by Wallace D. Wattles - Part Four; Attaining Cosmic Consciousness and Demonstrations and Attainment
item.description:
Part 4; A New Christ - In this 4 part series you are going to meet, perhaps for the first time, the real Jesus of Nazareth. You will learn what kind of man He really was, and what his true mission and purpose on earth was.

This series will not attempt to prove something about Christ; it will be an effort to ascertain by scientific study, what He was, how He lived, and what He taught. Too many people have studied Jesus from the standpoint of some preconcieved notion of Him or His mission, such an attitude always leads to eroneous conclusions.

From the Book "A New Christ" by Wallace D. WattlesClick here for the complete text of this classic for only $1.99.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support. Click here for Part 3 of this series.

item.title: On Good and Evil - Inspiration & Meditation Series
item.description:
Combining an atmospheric & ethereal blend of musical ambiance , On Good and evil asks for what is evil but good tortured by its own hunger and thirst? And if you would know God be not therefore a solver of riddles.

Whether one be a follower of the various faiths of this world or other worlds , the design of Donald Gordon Carty's work is enthralling. Take a moment & let the power of his work draw you into a new reality.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.

item.title: Inspiration & Meditation Series - On Houses
item.description:
Combining an atmospheric & ethereal blend of musical ambiance, "On Houses" discloses to us that as children of space, we will neither be trapped nor tamed. And our houses are a mast and and eyelid of our souls. Take a moment & let the power of Donald's work draw you into a new reality.

Donald Gordon Carty offers a unique glimpse & perspective to the inner workings & mind of man. The meditations & spoken word inspiration of D.G.C. are a wonder-send to all who sample his beatific & spiritual art.

item.title: Welcome to the S.o.U.L Ministries Spiritual Podcast - The Great Adventure Ahead
item.description:
Today the choice before us is definite and a vital one. We see it and recognize it. It is not lurking in the shadows, like a thief in the night waiting to surprise us; it is not out of sight over the horizon like a distant tornado which we need not fear.

No, the issue today is clear and ominous. If we use atomic fision in the world of force, we face doom.

We are compelled this time really to look at the two ways which Jesus told us about, the way of Caesar which is the way of violence and force, and the way of the Kingdom of God, which is the way of cooperation, compassion and fellowship.

If we think thoughts of Caesar's world we give our allegiance to Caesar; but if we think the thoughts of Jesus, our allegiance is to the Highest Power for good.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.

item.title: The Message of Isaiah the Prophet - Episode 1029
item.description:
The Book of Isaiah is a miniature bible. It has 66 chapters just as the Bible has 66 books. The 39 chapters of Isaiah speak for the most part of law and judgement just as the 39 books of the Old Testament. The 27 chapters of Isaiah speak of comfort, restoration, and mercy under the Messiah just as the 27 books of the New Testament speak of Jesus the Christ. Isaiah contains all that is found in the rest of the Bible.

Isaiah preached for over a period of about 40 years and his message covers just about every theme and doctrine of the Bible. Let us consider six of the Great Statements made in the book of Isaiah and their application to us Today.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.

item.title: Children and Marriage - Inspiration & Meditation Series
item.description:
Combining an atmospheric & ethereal blend of musical ambiance,

"Children" reveals the guileless flow of the Infinite within its boundless soul. It’s soliloquy is a sublime series of thoughts , rooted in eternity.

" Marriage" embraces the aloneness between the shores of our souls, searching for it's own awakening. The power that draws us together also, dances among us.

Whether one be a follower of the various faiths of this world or other worlds , the design of Donald Gordon Carty's work is enthralling. His meditations & spoken word inspiration are a wonder-send to all who sample his beatific & spiritual art. Take a moment & let the power of DGC's work draw you into a new reality.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.

item.title: A New Christ by Wallace D. Wattles - Part Two; His Teachings about Man and His Teachings about Wealth
item.description:
Part 2 - In this 4 part series you are going to meet, perhaps for the first time, the real Jesus of Nazareth. You will learn what kind of man He really was, and what his true mission and purpose on earth was.

This series will not attempt to prove something about Christ; it will be an effort to ascertain by scientific study, what He was, how He lived, and what He taught. Too many people have studied Jesus from the standpoint of some preconcieved notion of Him or His mission, such an attitude always leads to eroneous conclusions.

From the Book "A New Christ" by Wallace D. WattlesClick here for the complete text of this classic for only $1.99.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support. Click here for Part 1 of this series.

item.title: Inspiration & Meditation Series - On Talking and On Friendship
item.description:
Combining an atmospheric & ethereal blend of musical ambiance, "On Talking " suggests that you talk when you cease to be at peace with your thoughts. "On Friendship " says, your friend is your needs answered..

The meditations & spoken word inspiration of D.G.C. are a wonder-send to all who sample his beatific & spiritual art. Donald's art & prose speak in a spirit of self empowerment & love. Take a moment & let the power of his work draw you into a new reality.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.

item.title: The meaning and purpose of God's Word - Segment Eight; The Importance of Brokenness
item.description:
"Except the grain of wheat falling into the ground die, it abides alone; but if it die, it bears much fruit" (John 12:24) Life is within the grain of wheat. But there is a shell, a very hard shell on the outside. As long as the shell is not split open, the wheat cannot grow.

The question here is not whether life exists inside the shell, but whether the shell on the outside is cracked open.

Please help our Ministry by making a small donation through our sponsors, the Personal Development Institute and ourWorld. Thank You for your support.
